citations.narrative:
Eight enclosures housing 9 adult dogs and 12 puppies have an excessive buildup of feces in the outdoor side of their
sheltered enclosures. The licensee stated that the enclosures had not been cleaned in 3 or 4 days and is planning on
cleaning them today. A buildup of feces could cause the dogs to become soiled and increase the risk of poor health and
disease. Hard surfaces in contact with dogs must be spot-cleaned daily to prevent the accumulation of feces and reduce
disease hazards.
Correction date: December 11, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Eight enclosures housing 9 adult dogs and 12 puppies have an excessive buildup of feces in the outdoor side of their 
sheltered enclosures. The licensee stated that the enclosures had not been cleaned in 3 or 4 days and is planning on 
cleaning them today. A buildup of feces could cause the dogs to become soiled and increase the risk of poor health and 
disease. Hard surfaces in contact with dogs must be spot-cleaned daily to prevent the accumulation of feces and reduce 
disease hazards. 
Correction date: December 11, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
